meanings.sent1: I need to frab my room before my friends come over.
meanings.sent2: Mom asked me to frab the dishes after dinner.
meanings.sent3: After the party, it took hours to frab the mess in the living room.
meanings.sent4: Her organizing skills were so good, it was like she could frab chaos itself.
meanings.sent5: The maid's ability to frab a room was truly impressive.

meanings.sent1: She collected various frabs to display on her shelf.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop had a beautiful collection of frabs.
meanings.sent3: The frab on the table caught the sunlight and sparkled.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace was a frab that she treasured dearly.
meanings.sent5: The frab in the jewelry box was a precious gemstone.

meanings.sent1: Her frab desk was always free of clutter.
meanings.sent2: The librarian kept the books on the shelf in a frab manner.
meanings.sent3: The frab arrangement of flowers brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: His frab handwriting made his notes easy to read.
meanings.sent5: The frab rows of vegetables in the garden were a sight to behold.
